description: My place is close to The N train, shopping district, amazing restaurants. You’ll love my place because of the ambiance and the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). For those who are wondering, I bought a new bed.
name: BEAUTIFUL APT 10  MIN FROM MANHATTAN
review: Larry is a really nice guy and made an effort to be helpful. The place is in a GREAT location, and is big enough to sleep several people. The sink was clogged up, but it wasn't an issue since Larry was up front about it and so I didn't let it run. I appreciate that honesty! The place has really unique decorations which were fun to look at. One thing you should know when booking: there is a strong smell of smoke throughout. This wouldn't be an issue for many people, but it could be helpful to know going in.
